img_above_text:
The Rat Archer isn't a boss and fights like any other Rat Archer, so you will be familiar with his move set by the time you encounter him. Choose your times to attack wisely and don't forget to make use of Staff Spin to deflect any incoming projectiles. That is the best way to avoid attacks from any archer.
## Rat Archer Spirit
img_below_text:
* **Mighty Release**
* Equipped Effect: Moderately reduces the Stamina cost for Staff Spin.

img_summary: The image showcases the "Rat Archer Spirit" in the Equipment menu of a video game. This spirit allows the player to take the form of the Rat Archer, enabling them to load and shoot multiple arrows in succession for multi-hit damage. The equipped effect reduces the stamina cost for the Staff Spin ability, which is useful for deflecting projectiles. The menu also provides options to equip the spirit, view its demo, and examine its details.
